scripts.dev: bunx concurrently "cd web-express-youtubedl && bun start" "cd web-react-youtubedl && bun dev"
scripts.build: cd web-express-youtubedl && bun run build && cd ../web-react-youtubedl && bun run build
scripts.clean: cd web-express-youtubedl && bun clean && cd ../web-react-youtubedl && bun clean
